article_metadata.news-keywords: Cigna, Consumer watchdog, Podhurst orseck, whatley kallas, cigna lawsuit, cigna discrimination, cigna mail-order, cigna aids patiends, aids/hiv, aids/hiv patient discrimination
article_metadata.description: A Fort Lauderdale man has sued Cigna for requiring that HIV patients obtain medications through mail-order, a system the suit claims risks the health and privacy of patients.
article_metadata.title: Cigna sued over mail-order HIV med requirements | Miami Herald
